name: Gauntlet of the Wastes
flavorText: Offo of the Henknoc Tribe discovered a barrow in the wastes. Inside, skeletons with filed teeth were arrayed around the body of a great king. Offo left as quickly as he could, taking only the king’s gauntlets.
